name: Liminal Template I
desc: The template establishes a tenuous connection to the Liminality, its orange glow barely visible as it bends reality in small but meaningful ways.

name: Liminal Template II
desc: The template forges a resonant connection to the Liminality, its otherworldly energies flowing more freely through the vessel's systems.

name: Liminal Template III
desc: The template creates a harmonious bond with the Liminality, suffusing the ship with reality-warping potential that defies conventional physics.

name: Liminal Template IV
desc: The template achieves perfect synchronization with the Liminality, the boundary between possible and impossible becoming as fluid as the template's pulsing glow.
